abstract: His speech jolted the sleepy Senate to attention as he argued more explicitly than ever before for President Trump’s removal from office.
lead_paragraph: Representative Adam B. Schiff of California, the lead impeachment manager, stepped back to the Senate lectern around 10 p.m. Eastern to deliver one final argument for the day. It turned out to be a stemwinder, jolting the sleepy Senate to attention as Mr. Schiff argued more explicitly than ever before for President Trump’s removal from office.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
